    • Method Detail

      • buildCityResponse

        public static void buildCityResponse(int cityId,
                                     CityResponse response)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     CMAppException
        Build the city response by finding the city that matches the input id Use getCitiesList() to read the cities from the database file Use copyDbToResponse(CityResponse, CityResponse) to copy the found city data to the response
        Parameters:
        cityId - The entered city id
        response - Object to hold response data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when there is an error reading the database
        CMAppException - Thrown when the city id is not found in the database

      • buildRankResponse

        public static void buildRankResponse(RankRequest request,
                                     java.util.List<RankResponse> response)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Build the city list response by calculating sorting the overall score Use getCitiesList() to read the cities from the database file Use copyDbToResponse(CityResponse, CityResponse) to copy the found city data to the response
        Parameters:
        request - The request holding the user entered weight data
        response - The list of cities to return to the user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when there is an error reading the database

      • getCitiesList

        public static java.util.List<CityResponse> getCitiesList()
                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Read the list of cities in from the cities.json file
        Returns:
        The list of cities
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when there is an error reading the database

      • copyDbToResponse

        public static void copyDbToResponse(CityResponse response,
                                    CityResponse dbResponse)
        Copy the database response to the response object
        Parameters:
        response - The object to return to the user
        dbResponse - The database response object

      • calculateOverallScore

        public static void calculateOverallScore(RankRequest weights,
                                         RankResponse response)
        Calculate the overall score using the metric data and entered weights
        Parameters:
        weights - The weights entered by the user
        response - The response object to get the metric data from
